name: woody harrelson hates 5G
description: "I haven't vetted it [but] I find it very interesting," Woody Harrelson wrote about a theory that professor emeritus at Washington State University, Martin Pall has long posited that human brains would degenerate to the degree that normal functioning would cease as a result of exposure to electromagnetic waves. In particular, Martin Pall and other 5G conspiracy theorists see the prior installations of 10,000 antennas switched to 5G in Huwan, China as thousands of that city's citizens got COVID-19 virus as proof of the negative effects of 5G. He writes about it in Helvetica on his blog! Anywho, it's a massive boondoggle that requires teeth to make the sounds to perpetuate the debate. That's hyperrealism, baby.
